snippet.title: Resolutiion Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Resolutiion is a fast-paced action-adventure created by two angry German brothers leading a band of vagrants who loaded it with lovely pixels, dirty jokes, deep ideas and badassemotional tunes for hours of punishing combat, rewarding exploration, and layered storytelling.

Steampage: https://store.steampowered.com/app/975150/Resolutiion/
Official Website: https://resolutiion.monolithofminds.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/monolithofminds
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/monolithofminds/
